abstract: A new exhibition at the Grand Palais in Paris focuses its attention on the history of toys, from antiquity to the present day.
snippet: A new exhibition at the Grand Palais in Paris focuses its attention on the history of toys, from antiquity to the present day.
lead_paragraph: A new exhibition at the Grand Palais in Paris focuses its attention on the history of toys, from antiquity to the present day. Gathering 1,000 playthings of all types, "Of Toys and Men," on show through Jan. 23, aims to go beyond a simple timeline of dolls and teddy bears, and looks at the stereotypes represented in this miniature version of the grown-up world.

headline.main: Toy Exhibition in Paris Explores Meaning Behind Playthings
